per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);

per_frame_31=//This preset was originally made for my skin - "Kieslowski - Blue". Do a search for it at www.1001winampskins.com
warp_1=`sampler sampler_rand00;
warp_2=`sampler sampler_rand01;
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`    // sample previous frame
warp_6=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz-GetBlur1(uv);
warp_7=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_rand00,uv)-tex2D(sampler_rand01,uv))*0.75;
warp_8=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_9=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_10=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_11=`                      ).xyz*
warp_12=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_13=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_14=`                     );
warp_15=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_16=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_17=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_18=`
warp_19=`}
comp_1=`sampler sampler_rand00;
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`   uv*=0.5;
comp_5=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_6=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0.5,0)).xyz);
comp_7=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0,0.5)).xyz);
comp_8=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_main, uv+float2(0.5,0.5)).xyz);
comp_9=`
comp_10=`    //float2 l=(ret);
comp_11=`    //float sat=1;//length(ret);
comp_12=`
comp_13=`    //ret=lerp(lum(ret),ret,sat* 0); //over-saturate
comp_14=`    ret=lerp(ret,tex2D(sampler_rand00,ret.xy*.4+.6),.15); //take stripes from image
comp_15=`    ret *= .80; //gamma
comp_16=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_17=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_18=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_19=`                      ).xyz*
comp_20=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_21=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q30 
comp_22=`                     );
comp_23=`if(ret.x> q26*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q23*roam_sin.x)ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_24=`if(ret.y> q25*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q22*roam_cos.x)ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_25=`if(ret.z> q24*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q21*roam_sin.y)ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_26=`}
